name: Cretacious Crab Revolution
description:
This game is a submition for Global Game Jam 2021!

In this game, you will command a submarine, descending further into the deep waters of the ocean!
Rumors said that an extinct crab species was spotted! But you need to find it!
Pass obstacles, use your flashlight and follow the clues!

Programmer: Rodrigo Pereira Caetano da Silva

Character Artist : Marcelo Chiarastelli Rossato

Scenary Artist: Virgínia Cardoso de Toledo

Music: Dani Costa

Music/SFX: Waltson Tanaka and Robson Lourenço
